SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(TLRQ_CREDLIMREQC) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(TLRQ_CREDLIMREQH) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/TLRQ where TLRQ_NO = :2 and TLRQ_ADMNO = :3 and TLRQ_CLNTNO = :4 for fetch only
